statements: UPDATE actors SET a_age = 35, a_availability = TRUE WHERE a_id = 101;
UPDATE actors SET a_previous_perf = 'Award-winning actor' WHERE a_name = 'Tom Hanks';
UPDATE actors SET a_name='John Smith', a_age=35, a_gender='M', a_previous_perf='Theater, film, TV', a_availability=TRUE WHERE a_id=100;
UPDATE actors SET a_name='Sarah Johnson', a_availability=FALSE, a_gender='F', a_age=25, a_previous_perf='Film, TV' WHERE a_id=200;
